#summary Manual installation instructions for Open-IG

= Introduction =

This page details the manual installation instructions for Open Imperium Galactica.

*I strongly recommend using the [Launcher Launcher] application which will take care about all the file downloads and the proper startup parametrization of the game.*

= Details =

1) Download the current upgrade pack and main game JAR file from the downloads page:

[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-upgrade-20120625a2.zip Upgrade 2012-06-25-a-2]

[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-0.95.017.jar open-ig-0.95.017.jar]

Note that the *essential* upgrade pack contains the ever changing game model and image resources. Without it, the game might not work and behave properly.

2) Download the game resource files (1.1 GB!):


[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-hu-20120420A.zip Audio 1], [http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-en-20120623A Audio 2], [http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-de-20120420A.zip Audio 3], [http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-generic-20120620A Audio 4]<br><br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/open-ig/open-ig-splash.png Splash], [http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-images-20120625a Images]<br><br>

3) Place all these files into the same directory

4) Run the game:

 * double click on {{{open-ig-0.95.017.jar}}}, or
 * run the following command line: 

{{{
java -Xmx768M -jar open-ig-0.95.017.jar -memonce
}}}

 * create a shell script/batch file and put in: 

{{{
javaw -Xmx768M -jar open-ig-0.95.017.jar -memonce
}}}
